channel.title: [HELP] [PI] - How do i make a teleport interface?
channel.description:
Hello, my source has a "rock crabs" teleport that teleports them straight to rock crabs. I want to change that to "Monster teleports" and when i click on it, an interface shows up and i can chose between island, rock crabs etc.
Could you guys help me? Thank you. =)

item.title: [HELP] [PI] - How do i make a teleport interface?
item.dc:creator: @knucklescape knucklescape
item.description:
@knucklescape wrote:

Thank you for your help, but i was actually wondering how to make a teleport interface. Like, a interface like this:

[code]Choose an option:

     Rock Crabs
     Island
     [/code]

And stuff. =)

Read full topic
item.source: [HELP] [PI] - How do i make a teleport interface?

item.title: [HELP] [PI] - How do i make a teleport interface?
item.dc:creator: @josdog josdog
item.description:
@josdog wrote:

Do you have a ::coords command? If you do, teleport to the crabs with the teleport, get the coords and search the coords up in your files. If you can find them, just change them to the coords of the monster place. (Get the coords of that place too) Hope this helped… I don’t really deal with PI’s that much…

Edit: I don’t know if PI’s have it, but it could be in a commandhandler.java file or something along those lines. (Where all the code for your commands is stored)

Read full topic
item.source: [HELP] [PI] - How do i make a teleport interface?
